%c[255,20,120,215]Electro-Bengal%c[default] Very rare and therefore, despite its fairly average properties, highly valued by Zone traders.
%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Glare%c[default] Stalkers often confuse it with the "Flash" artifact, hence the name "Glare". Radioactive.
%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Pseudo-Light%c[default] Externally resembles "Moonlight", hence the name. Where and how it appears is still unclear. Radioactive.
%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Dirigible%c[default] Very rare artifact formed by spatial rupture anomaly, known among stalkers as "Greedy".
%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Medusa Gorgon%c[default] Appears under unknown circumstances, but according to stalker rumors, when worn completely prevents "lulling" by cats.

%c[255,20,120,215]Cobblestone%c[default] Artifact that lost all its properties due to energy collapse. Has one feature: take more - carry farther.
%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Pizza%c[default] Second name: "Scrambled Eggs". Named for external similarity to these food products. When worn prevents hunger when meeting zombies.
%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Dandelion%c[default] Shows property completely incomprehensible in its physical principles - when activated, air surrounding the wearer becomes very viscous. Due to this property often called "Parachute". When worn supposedly allows jumping from great height without major damage.
%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Battery%c[default] Very rare artifact. Rumored to have some special protection from electricity. No harmful effects from this artifact observed yet.

%c[255,20,120,215]Scale%c[default] Mezomodificate reduces human exposure to chemically aggressive environments, improves telepathy susceptibility, removes psi-radiation. However it's radioactive and increases bleeding in the wearer.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Great-Granny's Beads%c[default] Mezomodificate has somewhat better bullet wound resistance due to temporal field increase. Improves telepathy susceptibility, very good protection from psi-seizures. Can carry significantly more additional weight. However it's radioactive.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Tears of Fire%c[default] Mezomodificate quite well increases endurance of person wearing this mezomodificate on belt, good protection from fire and electricity. Increases vulnerability to impact and rupture.

%c[255,20,120,215]Slug%c[default] Artifact most often found near "Jelly" anomaly. Wearing this translucent gelatinous formation on belt reduces probability of losing large amount of blood from severe wounds, but makes person vulnerable to all types of burns.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Crystal Thorn%c[default] Artifact can be found near "Rusty Hair" anomaly. It removes radiation from human body and increases jump height, but also opens bleeding, so when wearing this artifact one must be careful and not forget its negative effects.

%c[255,20,120,215]Porcupine%c[default] Despite being very simple, this modificate has high radioactive blocking rating, increases jump! Modificate slightly reduces endurance, increases bleeding, which is modest price for ability to wander radioactive lands without fear of lethal radiation dose.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Steel Ball%c[default] Modificate reduces skin sensitivity to rupture and impact. Unfortunately radioactive and sensitive to telepathy.

%c[255,20,120,215]Hide%c[default] Modificate reduces susceptibility to any chemically aggressive environment, slightly improves telepathy resistance, excellently removes psi-radiation. Radioactive.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Granny's Beads%c[default] Resulting modificate generates temporal field significantly slowing bullet speed, protecting person from critical wounds. Improves telepathy susceptibility, good protection from psi-seizures. Can carry more additional weight. Radioactive.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Electra's Tears%c[default] Modificate increases endurance, gives electricity and fire protection, negatively affects impact and rupture resistance.

%c[255,20,120,215]Mommy's Beads%c[default] Wonderful artifact, treasure it. Good because it has only positive qualities (unique phenomenon, as only positive properties usually belong to absolutes). Scientists rack their brains over how to get such properties in laboratory. Artifact significantly slows bullet flight speed. Interest shown by everyone and their dog.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Ball%c[default] Artifact of unknown origin. When worn on belt significantly increases body resistance to any physical damage.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Spring%c[default] Origin unknown. When worn on belt reduces probability of serious trauma from impacts.

%c[255,20,120,215]Jellyfish%c[default] Artifact formed in "Springboard" anomaly. Compressed plant and foliage remains twisted by strong gravity. When worn increases immunity to gravitational anomalies like "Jelly", also shows minor protective field effect reducing small arms damage. Removes psi. Slightly radioactive.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Twist%c[default] Artifact formed in "Whirlpool" anomaly. Compressed plant, soil and small object remains twisted by strong gravity. Weakly radioactive. Can maintain small anti-gravitational field around itself. Many stalkers use it to slightly reduce backpack weight.

%c[255,20,120,215]Bubble%c[default] Strange artifact. Scientists found no useful properties when worn.
%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Canister%c[default] Pretty thing. Seems to have no useful properties when stimulated.
%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Electro-Beads%c[default] Excellent electrical protection and bullet resistance. Transmutation method unknown.
%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Emerald Trinity%c[default] Includes three artifacts: "Emerald Jellyfish", "Emerald Twist" and "Emerald Stone Blood". Look ordinary but green. Completely non-radioactive, emit weak light. Belief about their appearance from combining anomaly types - "Springboard" and "Jelly", "Whirlpool" and "Jelly", "Carousel" and "Jelly".

%c[255,20,120,215]Electric Porcupine%c[default] Mezomodificate has radiation and electricity blocking rating, but unfortunately increases fatigue and bleeding sensitivity.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Titanium Ball%c[default] Mezomodificate reduces skin sensitivity to rupture and impact. Unfortunately radioactive and telepathy sensitive.

%c[255,20,120,215]Meat Chunk%c[default] Artifact formed in "Carousel" anomaly. Ugly yellowish formation of compressed and twisted polymerized flesh and bone remains of dead creatures. When worn mysteriously slightly speeds wound healing and stops bleeding. Stalkers believe this artifact contains power of people who died in anomaly. Simultaneously worsens physical damage resistance.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Flash%c[default] Artifact formed in "Electra" anomaly. Light translucent amorphous formation with internal light rays, rarely emitting small sparks. Wearing on belt slightly increases endurance by increased calorie consumption, causing constant hunger, but makes person vulnerable to electricity, accumulates radiation.

%c[255,20,120,215]Stone Flower%c[default] Born in "Springboard" anomaly. Such artifact can be found in different Zone areas. Metallic compound inclusions give beautiful light play. Examining this artifact by campfire at night is wonderfully calming.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Gravi%c[default] Beautiful artifact formed in "Whirlpool" anomaly. Compressed plant, soil and everything twisted by strong gravity. Radioactive. Can maintain small anti-gravitational field around itself. Many stalkers use it to significantly reduce backpack weight.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Fireball%c[default] Artifact most often found near "Frying" anomaly. Translucent reddish spherical formation. Stalkers say wearing artifact reduces body radiation level. But due to strong heat emission endurance worsens.

%c[255,20,120,215]Crystal%c[default] Artifact born in "Springboard" anomaly as capsule. Can be found in few Zone areas. Metallic compound inclusions give beautiful light play. When worn significantly reduces body radiation level. Examining this artifact by campfire at night is wonderfully calming.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Mica%c[default] Third level artifact, rumored to form in "Jelly" anomaly as capsule. When worn reduces probability of losing large amount of blood from severe wounds. Selling price very high.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Sea Urchin%c[default] Artifact most often found near "Rusty Hair" anomaly as capsule. Removes radiation from human body and increases jump height. However constant use risks large blood loss. High price. Interest from scientific organizations, collectors and jewelers.

%c[255,20,120,215]Pudding%c[default] Absolute well neutralizes electroshock, fire, radiation accumulation.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Bengal Crystal Soul%c[default] This absolute excellently removes radiation and psi-radiation from human body, improves health. Highly valued both in Zone and beyond.

%c[255,20,120,215]Stone Porcupine%c[default] This absolute reduces human radiation dose by exactly one quarter. Besides this rarest quality, it reduces human explosion sensitivity, effectively reduces bleeding. Valued by both scientists and stalkers.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Giant's Little Brother%c[default] This absolute reduces wearer's skin sensitivity to rupture, impact, radiation accumulation.

%c[255,20,120,215]Empty%c[default] Origin unknown. Two hard disks held together by slime. Artifact reduces thermal anomaly damage by absorbing excess thermal energy. High selling price. Interest from scientific organizations.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Battery%c[default] Origin unknown. Ribbed shiny formation. Very useful artifact for wearer. Improves all electricity susceptibility characteristics. Seems artifact enhances any processes around it. Huge selling price. Special interest from scientific organizations.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Film%c[default] This artifact is so rare many researchers don't suspect such substance can exist naturally. Repels caustic chemical components.

%c[255,20,120,215]Symbiont%c[default] Unique empty. Excellent protection from various psi-effects and speeds psi-health recovery. Huge selling price. Special interest from scientific organizations.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Ruby Trinity%c[default] Includes three artifacts: "Ruby Spring", "Ruby Battery" and "Ruby Film" resembling ordinary versions but red colored. Synthesis method unknown.

%c[255,20,120,215]Moon Empty%c[default] Hypermodificate well increases endurance, electroshock sensitivity, radiation removal.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Crystal Soul%c[default] This hypermodificate retains health improvement and increased fatigue properties, electricity sensitive. Very high radionuclide removal from human body.

%c[255,20,120,215]Bengal Fire%c[default] Artifact formed in "Electra" anomaly. Translucent amorphous very light formation rarely emitting small sparks. Wearing on belt slightly increases endurance but makes person electricity vulnerable and causes increased hunger.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Slime%c[default] Artifact found near "Jelly" anomaly. Translucent gelatinous formation. When worn reduces probability of losing large blood amounts from severe wounds, but increases vulnerability to all burn types.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Thorn%c[default] Artifact very often found near "Rusty Hair" anomaly. Removes radiation from human body and increases jump height. However causes strong bleeding in people with weakened immunity.

%c[255,20,120,215]Snotty Porcupine%c[default] This hypermodificate has radiation blocking rating - person receives only one-third radiation they would get without wearing this hypermodificate on belt. Also effectively stops chemical burns and bleeding. Unpleasant side is increased fatigue sensitivity and uncomfortable wearing due to constantly oozing mysterious slime. Substance is harmless but utterly unpleasant.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Diamond Ball%c[default] Hypermodificate gives wearer's skin rupture resistance, reduces impact effect. Downside is radioactivity.

%c[255,20,120,215]Bright Empty%c[default] Result of further modificate evolution, reduces body susceptibility to electroshock and radiation accumulation. Only thing remaining unchanged in this mezomodificate - negative bullet resistance and explosion ratings.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Fire Soul%c[default] Mezomodificate retains health improvement property but 1.5 times more effectively reduces radiation dose. Simultaneously negatively affects human endurance, electricity sensitive.

%c[255,20,120,215]Shell%c[default] - Hypermodificate increases telepathy susceptibility, removes psi-radiation, neutralizes most chemically aggressive environments on human skin contact. Only negative quality is small radiation background.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Burer Granny's Beads%c[default] Unique hypermodificate, more like absolute in properties. Its temporal field is strong and large radius, so person wearing it on belt has good chance surviving even SVD hit. Improves telepathy susceptibility, excellent psi-seizure protection. Allows carrying additional weight.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Chimera's Tears%c[default] This hypermodificate besides very good endurance increase, also useful for fire and electricity protection. Increases impact and rupture vulnerability.

%c[255,20,120,215]Fire Empty%c[default] This modificate besides neutralizing high temperature, adds electricity resistance to belt wearer. But makes body more susceptible to bullet and shrapnel wounds.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Soul Drop%c[default] Modificate improves health and reduces radiation dose. Slightly increases human fatigue, electricity sensitivity.

%c[255,20,120,215]Drop%c[default] Artifact appearing near "Frying" anomaly. Small drop-shaped formation with cracked glossy surface. Stalkers say wearing this artifact reduces body radiation level, but due to strong heat emission endurance worsens.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Stone Blood%c[default] Artifact formed in "Carousel" anomaly. Ugly reddish formation of compressed and twisted polymerized plant, soil, flesh and bone remains of dead stalkers and mutants. When worn mysteriously slightly speeds wound healing. Simultaneously worsens physical damage resistance. Stalkers believe this artifact contains power of people who died in anomaly.

%c[255,20,120,215]Night Star%c[default] Artifact extremely rarely formed in "Springboard" anomaly as capsule. Beautiful formation with mirror surface and colored phosphorescent inclusions. At night illuminates greenish light in 1-2 meter radius, earning stalker name. When worn increases immunity to chemical anomalies like "Jelly", "Kissel", and shows protective field effect reducing small arms damage. Long wearing contraindicated due to radioactivity.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Goldfish%c[default] Artifact extremely rarely appearing in "Whirlpool" anomaly as capsule. Beautiful mirror-surfaced formation. Compressed metal twisted by strong gravity mixed with everything entering anomaly during discharge. Highly radioactive. Can generate anti-gravitational field locally reducing gravity effect.

%c[255,20,120,215]Controller's Scalp%c[default] This absolute excellently reduces aggressive chemical environment damage, very well screens and removes psi-radiation.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Burer Great-Granny's Beads%c[default] Unique absolute, improves telepathy susceptibility, magnificently protects from psi-seizures, carry much, don't get tired.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Giant's Tear%c[default] This absolute significantly increases human endurance, also useful for excellent fire and electricity protection.

%c[255,20,120,215]Soul%c[default] Artifact formed in "Carousel" anomaly as capsule. Yellowish-red shiny formation of compressed and twisted polymerized fresh living flesh remains. Stalkers believe this artifact contains souls of people who died in anomaly. When worn speeds wound healing and stops heavy bleeding. Simultaneously significantly worsens physical damage resistance.\n%c[255, 20, 120, 215]Moonlight%c[default] Artifact formed in "Electra" anomaly as capsule. Light translucent amorphous formation with glowing core emitting small sparks. Wearing artifact doesn't increase endurance, but due to increased energy consumption person must eat significantly more than usual. When entering "Electra" anomaly chances of survival for wearer remain minimal, accumulates radiation.
